Web design by Joke De Winter

Elements

Each element is a single column of content.

All elements take at least one class column__[ELEMENT-NAME].

The following element names are available to use:

  • column__text
  • column__bullets
  • column__toggle accordion
  • column__icon
  • column__image

Full text

A column element with all the trimmings. It includes a title, standout text and further explainer paragraphs. The element class is column__text.

  • The element heading is a h2 element with a class of text__title.
  • Standout text are p elements inside a div container with a class text__standout.
  • The further explainer text are simple p tags.

All elements inside this column element are optional.

Section title

Intro paragraph to this section. Duis lobortis id est ac tristique.

Further explainer text if needed can go here. Aenean eget vulputate augue. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Praesent ultricies nec lectus ut porta.

<section class="column__text">
    <h2 class="text__title">Section title</h2>
    <div class="text__standout">
        <p>Intro paragraph to this section. Duis lobortis id est ac tristique.</p>
    </div>
    <p>Further explainer text if needed can go here. Aenean eget vulputate augue. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Praesent ultricies nec lectus ut porta.</p>
</section>

Text only

A column element like the full text element, but with only text. The element class is column__text.

Adding a class of text__standout will make the text go bold.

Text only column. Duis lobortis id est ac tristique. Mauris et aliquam elit, at aliquam elit. Proin sed ligula gravida lectus sagittis sodales.

Fusce consectetur libero ipsum, nec tempus nisl dictum ac. Phasellus luctus velit sit amet ex rhoncus, tempor congue elit ultricies. Vestibulum vestibulum odio at finibus rutrum. Curabitur aliquam suscipit libero, quis pretium tellus molestie ac.

Highlighted text. Duis lobortis id est ac tristique. Mauris et aliquam elit, at aliquam elit. Proin sed ligula gravida lectus sagittis sodales.

<section class="column__text">
    <p>Text only column. Duis lobortis id est ac tristique. Mauris et aliquam elit, at aliquam elit. Proin sed ligula gravida lectus sagittis sodales.</p>
    <p>Fusce consectetur libero ipsum, nec tempus nisl dictum ac. Phasellus luctus velit sit amet ex rhoncus, tempor congue elit ultricies. Vestibulum vestibulum odio at finibus rutrum. Curabitur aliquam suscipit libero, quis pretium tellus molestie ac.</p>
</section>

<hr> 

<section class="column__text text__standout">
    <p>Highlighted text. Duis lobortis id est ac tristique. Mauris et aliquam elit, at aliquam elit. Proin sed ligula gravida lectus sagittis sodales.</p>
</section>

List with bullets

A column element with a title and a bulleted list. The element class is column__bullets.

  • The element heading is a h2 element with a class of text__title.
  • The bulleted list is a simple unordered list (ul).
  • Text inside a li element sits inside a p tag.

All elements inside this column element are optional.

Section title

  • Bullet point

  • Bullet point

  • Bullet point

<section class="column__bullets">
    <h2 class="text__title">Section title</h2>
    <ul>
        <li><p>Bullet point</p></li>
        <li><p>Bullet point</p></li>
        <li><p>Bullet point</p></li>
    </ul>
</section><!-- .column__bullets -->

List with checks

A column element with a title and a bulleted list, where the bullets have been replaced with checks. The element class is column__bullets.

  • The element heading is a h2 element with a class of text__title.
  • The bulleted list is a simple unordered list (ul) with a list-with-checks class.
  • Text inside a li element sits inside a p tag.

Section title

  • Bullet point

  • Bullet point

    Bullet point explanation. Vestibulum vestibulum odio at finibus rutrum. Curabitur aliquam suscipit libero, quis pretium tellus molestie ac.

  • Bullet point

  • Bullet point

<section class="column__bullets">
    <h2 class="text__title">Section title</h2>
    <ul class="list-with-checks">
        <li><p>Bullet point</p></li>
        <li>
            <p>Bullet point</p>
            <p>Bullet point explanation. Vestibulum vestibulum odio at finibus rutrum. Curabitur aliquam suscipit libero, quis pretium tellus molestie ac.</p>
        </li>
        <li><p>Bullet point</p></li>
        <li><p>Bullet point</p></li>
    </ul>
</section><!-- .column__bullets -->

Toggle element

A column element with a toggled list. The element class is column__toggle accordion.

This element requires some JavaScript and specific data attributes for the content.

Title of toggle item

Text of the toggled item. Ut efficitur urna sit amet iaculis suscipit. Nunc et fermentum nisi.

Title of toggle item

Text of the toggled item. Etiam dictum, dui ut viverra ullamcorper, ipsum dolor ultrices libero, vitae venenatis dolor risus id metus.

Title of toggle item

Text of the toggled item. Suspendisse potenti. Suspendisse est nibh, congue sed porta eget, pulvinar ut tortor.

<section class="column__toggle accordion" data-aria-accordion data-constant>
    <h3 data-aria-accordion-heading>Title of toggle item</h3>
    <div data-aria-accordion-panel>
        <p>Text of the toggled item. Ut efficitur urna sit amet iaculis suscipit. Nunc et fermentum nisi.</p>
    </div>
    <h3 data-aria-accordion-heading>Title of toggle item</h3>
    <div data-aria-accordion-panel>
        <p>Text of the toggled item. Etiam dictum, dui ut viverra ullamcorper, ipsum dolor ultrices libero, vitae venenatis dolor risus id metus.</p>
    </div>
    <h3 data-aria-accordion-heading>Title of toggle item</h3>
    <div data-aria-accordion-panel>
        <p>Text of the toggled item. Suspendisse potenti. Suspendisse est nibh, congue sed porta eget, pulvinar ut tortor.</p>
    </div>
</section><!-- .column__toggle -->

Icon list with bullets

A column element to be used inside the triple column block. It contains an SVG icon, a title and a bulleted list.

  • The element heading is a h2 element with a class of text__title.
  • The bulleted list is a simple unordered list (ul).
  • Text inside a li element sits inside a p tag.

A list of available SVG icons is listed in the Typography section.

Column title

  • Bullet point

  • Bullet point

  • Bullet point

<section class="column__icon">
    <img class="svg__icon" src="assets/images/icon-management.svg" alt="">
    <h2 class="text__title">Column title</h2>
    <ul>
        <li><p>Bullet point</p></li>
        <li><p>Bullet point</p></li>
        <li><p>Bullet point</p></li>
    </ul>
</section>

Icon list with checks

A column element to be used inside the triple column block. It contains an SVG icon, a title and a bulleted list with checks.

  • The element heading is a h2 element with a class of text__title.
  • The bulleted list is a simple unordered list (ul) with a list-with-checks class.
  • Text inside a li element sits inside a p tag.

A list of available SVG icons is listed in the Typography section.

Column title

  • Bullet point

  • Bullet point

    Bullet point explanation. Vestibulum vestibulum odio at finibus rutrum. Curabitur aliquam suscipit libero, quis pretium tellus molestie ac.

  • Bullet point

  • Bullet point

<section class="column__icon">
    <img class="svg__icon" src="assets/images/icon-autoscale.svg" alt="">
    <h2 class="text__title">Column title</h2>
    <ul class="list-with-checks">
        <li><p>Bullet point</p></li>
        <li>
            <p>Bullet point</p>
            <p>Bullet point explanation. Vestibulum vestibulum odio at finibus rutrum. Curabitur aliquam suscipit libero, quis pretium tellus molestie ac.</p>
        </li>
        <li><p>Bullet point</p></li>
        <li><p>Bullet point</p></li>
    </ul>
</section>

Icon list with text

A column element to be used inside the triple column block. It contains an SVG icon, a title and a bulleted list with checks.

  • The element heading is a h2 element with a class of text__title.
  • The text are simple p tags.

A list of available SVG icons is listed in the Typography section.

Column title

Etiam dictum, dui ut viverra ullamcorper, ipsum dolor ultrices libero, vitae venenatis dolor risus id metus. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Nullam pellentesque ullamcorper tortor ac commodo.

<section class="column__icon">
    <img class="svg__icon" src="assets/images/icon-user-profile.svg" alt="">
    <h2 class="text__title">Column title</h2>
    <p>Etiam dictum, dui ut viverra ullamcorper, ipsum dolor ultrices libero, vitae venenatis dolor risus id metus. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Nullam pellentesque ullamcorper tortor ac commodo.</p>
</section>

Image

A column element with an image. The element is a figure tag with a class column__image.

<figure class="column__image">
    <img src="assets/images/wvd-ecosystem.svg" alt="Illustration of the full Windows Virtual Desktop Ecosystem.">
</figure>
